title: Colonial House in Ahangama
details: This characterful house, originally built over 100 years ago, sits on 100 perches of land in a tranquil area near Ahangama. The house offers six bedrooms, a large living room, a kitchen, a courtyard, a dining area and a shared bathroom. The property is well connected to good access roads. There is enough space to build a swimming pool if so desired. The property is just 5 minutes away from the beautiful beaches and only 20 minutes by car to Galle Fort.
